${modID}:MoldedSand.NAME: Molded Sand
${modID}:MoldedSand.FLAVOR: A peculiar structure made of hardened sand.
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal and receive double attack damage.

${modID}:Eggshells.NAME: Eggshells
${modID}:Eggshells.FLAVOR: Whatever was inside seems to have fled... what a pity!
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards you draw during your first turn are #yUpgraded for the rest of combat.

${modID}:TheNail.NAME: The Nail
${modID}:TheNail.FLAVOR: A miniscule metal nail, likely used in miniature jousting matches.
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing a card #yUpgrades it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:TheNeedle.NAME: The Needle
${modID}:TheNeedle.FLAVOR: A miniscule metal needle, likely used in miniature sewing competitions.
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing an #yAttack converts #b1 #yStrength to #yDexterity. Playing a #ySkill converts #b1 #yDexterity to #yStrength.

${modID}:LineGraph.NAME: Line Graph
${modID}:LineGraph.FLAVOR: A sheet of canvas with a line haphazardly painted on it. The back describes something called "Sneckonomics."
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b
of your current #yGold as #yGold.

${modID}:LetterpressStamp.NAME: Letterpress Stamp
${modID}:LetterpressStamp.FLAVOR: A stamp made to make writing a letter quicker. Which specific letter has been lost to time.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each combat is played twice.

${modID}:MummifiedFoot.NAME: Mummified Foot
${modID}:MummifiedFoot.FLAVOR: Frequently twitches, especially when your pulse is high.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each combat costs #b0.

${modID}:CloakOfDisplacement.NAME: Cloak of Displacement
${modID}:CloakOfDisplacement.FLAVOR: A black cloak whose form seems to shift and change in front of you.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBlock is not removed at the start of your first #b
turns.

${modID}:StickyHand.NAME: Sticky Hand
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yInnate card, draw #b
card.

${modID}:BeckoningSnecko.NAME: Beckoning Snecko
${modID}:BeckoningSnecko.FLAVOR: Its eyes are ever so inviting...
DESCRIPTIONS: You only need #b
#yMantra to enter #yDivinity.

${modID}:HarmonizationMatrix.NAME: Harmonization Matrix
${modID}:HarmonizationMatrix.FLAVOR: You feel the sparks and whirring of nearby automatons. Invigorating!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first #b
turns, gain #b1 #yFocus.

${modID}:Lubricant.NAME: Lubricant
${modID}:Lubricant.FLAVOR: "WARNING: If ingested, please tell us what happens to you."
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play a #b0 cost card each turn, draw #b1 card.

${modID}:AdamantineHammer.NAME: Adamantine Hammer
${modID}:AdamantineHammer.FLAVOR: You expected a hammer forged from the strongest metal around to be a bit heavier.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you smith at #yRest #ySites, you may choose an additional card to #yUpgrade.

${modID}:TrainingWheels.NAME: Training Wheels
${modID}:TrainingWheels.FLAVOR: Don't take them off while you're still learning!
DESCRIPTIONS: All cards cost #b1 [E] to play.

${modID}:StuffedBird.NAME: Stuffed Bird
${modID}:StuffedBird.FLAVOR: It seems to stare through you to your very soul...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Whenever you remove or #yTransform a card in your deck, add a random #yCurse to your deck.

${modID}:PuritySeal.NAME: Purity Seal
${modID}:PuritySeal.FLAVOR: Littered with prayers to "The Emperor". Holding it fills you with fervor.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Negates the first #b
buffs you gain each combat.

${modID}:TinBracelet.NAME: Tin Bracelet
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot gain energy during your turn.

${modID}:ProstheticLimb.NAME: Prosthetic Limb
${modID}:ProstheticLimb.FLAVOR: A limb ripped from an automoton, it still retains some energy.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b
card. Your hand size limit is increased by #b

${modID}:CrimsonLily.NAME: Crimson Lily
${modID}:CrimsonLily.FLAVOR: Ancient scripts describe warriors using these flowers to channel their fury.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter #yWrath, gain #b
temporary #yStrength.

${modID}:BarbedWire.NAME: Barbed Wire
${modID}:BarbedWire.FLAVOR: Prickly metal wire woven into a spiral, it seems to have been cut short.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b
#yThorns.

${modID}:BottomlessFlask.NAME: Bottomless Flask
${modID}:BottomlessFlask.FLAVOR: Filled with a mysterious liquid that evaporates quickly. When you're not looking, it refills itself.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now brew #b
potions at Rest Sites.

${modID}:CorkStopper.NAME: Cork Stopper
${modID}:CorkStopper.FLAVOR: Its holes have holes which have holes...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a potion, draw #b
card.

${modID}:DullShard.NAME: Dull Shard
${modID}:DullShard.FLAVOR: Looking through the shard you see nothing particularly interesting.
DESCRIPTIONS: Combat reward screens now contain colorless cards.
